fixes.name: fixed netting
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR val_R = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting 3 R]
VAR val_RR = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[fixed netting 3 RR]
RETURN IF(val_R < val_RR, val_R, val_RR)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau FIXED LOD that returns the minimum of two calculated fields into a DAX measure. The two referenced calculated fields are accessed directly using the table-qualified references; VARs capture each value and an IF expression returns the smaller of the two.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD ({FIXED ...}) which is an aggregation/context-level calculation; per rules it must be implemented as a measure in Power BI.
